thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Huafon Microfibre Shanghai sees FY 2017 net profit up 150 pct to 180 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Huafon Microfibre Shanghai sees FY 2017 net profit up 150 pct to 180 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - huafon microfibre shanghai co ltd

text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Huafon Microfibre Shanghai Co Ltd
* Says it sees net profit for FY 2017 to increase by 150 percent to 180 percent, or to be 251.4 million yuan to 281.5 million yuan
* Says the net profit of FY 2016 was 100.5 million yuan
* Comments that increased sales and inclusion of new company as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/mhpPAo
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
